messages.subject: Re: [SHQ_Spy_Division] Re: RKDreams
messages.msgSnippet: ... No, no, no, no, no. We ve had it all wrong! It s the ghost of the Ishin! Particularly Saigo! He s such an attention hog! He can t stand that the
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/4/2004 2:07:24 AM Eastern Daylight Time, spiritus_saitou@... writes:

> Frankly, one would think Okita et al. would *support* us being over in Ishin Shishi territory... Maybe it's Sagara who's stopping us from getting into RKDreams.
>
> phil (who's just now uploading 2 new pages to the Visions site... the rest of the pages are going to be *very* slow
> going... sigh... )

No, no, no, no, no. We've had it all wrong! It's the ghost of the Ishin! Particularly Saigo! He's such an attention hog! He can't stand that the Shinsengumi have such a devoted following, so he wants to keep us away from any sites where he stands even half a chance of getting noticed! LOL!

-MissBehavin

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ_Spy_Division] Re: RKDreams
messages.msgSnippet: Frankly, one would think Okita et al. would *support* us being over in Ishin Shishi territory...  Maybe it s Sagara who s stopping us from getting into
messages.messageBody:
Frankly, one would think Okita et al. would *support* us being over in Ishin Shishi territory... Maybe it's Sagara who's stopping us from getting into RKDreams.

phil (who's just now uploading 2 new pages to the Visions site... the rest of the pages are going to be *very* slow going... sigh... )

secretary <secretarytocapt3@...> wrote:
I've been unable to access rkdreams.com as well...they are dedicated
folks the forum should be back up soon there are so many interesting
threads...I tend to think that Okita's ghost has tracked down all
our isps and trying to prevent us from gossiping about him and his
buddies on an Ishin Shishi forum ^_^

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ_Spy_Division] RKDreams
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks for the info.  It just seemed so weird that what appears to be a successful forum would just disappear.  I was beginning to wonder if they were locking
messages.messageBody:
Thanks for the info. It just seemed so weird that what appears to be a successful forum would just disappear. I was beginning to wonder if they were locking out wolves. :-) Hope they find a new home soon.

phil

sherlgirl <sherlgirl@...> wrote:
The server has been up and down for weeks now, but has been esp. unstable the last week or so.
Last I heard the forum owners are looking into changing servers.

Keep trying and be patient ^_^
S
